abstract: The low profile of Citigroup’s chief executive, Michael L. Corbat, may be an advantage. | November is shaping up to be the month that puts many hedge funds solidly in the black for the year. | T-Mobile’s chief executive is shaking up the mobile industry. | Martin Scorsese’s cinematic romp through the securities business is the director’s longest film ever.
snippet: The low profile of Citigroup’s chief executive, Michael L. Corbat, may be an advantage. | November is shaping up to be the month that puts many hedge funds solidly in the black for the year. | T-Mobile’s chief executive is shaking up the mobile in...
lead_paragraph: Michael L. Corbat has kept a relatively low profile since taking the helm of Citigroup in October 2012. And that appears to be just fine with the bank he runs, Susanne Craig and Jessica Silver-Greenberg report in DealBook.
